lines.text: Me uncle went out with a girl half his age.
No. Me auntie found him and brought him home.

[pointing to his own head]
It's always midnight in here.
If my Derek were to kill me, what would it be called?
You know what they say about solicitors - problems solved while you wait... and wait and wait.

[to a customer about Zoe]
I dropped her on her head once when she was a baby, unfortunately not hard enough.
